basicInfo.parentCompany: Independent (publicly traded on Euronext Paris as OVH since Oct 2021; Klaba family majority stake)
basicInfo.notes: Founded in 1999 by Octave Klaba in Roubaix, France. Rebranded to OVHcloud in 2019. Europe's largest cloud provider with 44+ data centers across 10 countries. KKR and TowerBrook acquired minority stake for â‚¬250M in 2016. IPO on Euronext Paris in October 2021. Owns and operates its own data centers with water-cooling technology for sustainability. Major 2021 Strasbourg fire affected customers but recovery was managed.

pricing.moneyBackExclusions: 14-day withdrawal right for EU private customers only; Custom services and domains excluded; Must not have opted out during order; VPS/dedicated servers typically non-refundable once delivered

serverPerformance.ddosProtectionLevel: Included on all services (L7 for web hosting)

support.prioritySupportCost: Premium Support starts at additional monthly fee

policiesOverages.bandwidthOveragePolicy: Unlimited traffic (throttled in APAC regions after quota)
policiesOverages.storageOveragePolicy: Must upgrade plan; no automatic overages
policiesOverages.accountSuspensionPolicy: Violation of ToS; non-payment; abuse reports investigated
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Black Hat SEO; traffic exchange; port scanning; intrusion attempts; DDOS attacks
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: No typical renewal markup (prices stay consistent); cPanel/Plesk licenses extra on VPS; Premium support extra; CDN not included; No website builder included; Domain privacy not included

contentRestrictions.contentNotes: European provider - notably more permissive than US-based competitors

business.affiliateCommissionAmount: VPS: 9% new / 6.4% existing; Dedicated: 12.8% new / 9.6% existing; Hosting: $7.25 flat; Other: 3.2%; 45-day cookie

editorial.knownIssues: Support response times criticized (slow outside business hours); Complex interface reported by some users; 2021 Strasbourg data center fire destroyed customer data; UK Trustpilot rating only 1.2/5; Canada Trustpilot 1.6/5; No managed migration service; No staging environment on shared hosting; cPanel/Plesk discontinued for VPS (must bring your own license); Documentation can be hard to navigate
editorial.bestFor: Budget-conscious developers and businesses; European customers needing EU data sovereignty; VPS and dedicated server users wanting consistent pricing; Infrastructure-as-a-service needs; Users wanting to avoid renewal price increases; Large-scale cloud deployments; Users comfortable with self-management
editorial.avoidIf: Need hand-holding support; Require managed WordPress hosting; Want included website builder; Need staging environments; Prefer phone support 24/7; Want included CDN; Based in UK or Canada (poor regional ratings); Need included cPanel
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: Cheapest shared hosting ($1.04 vs competitors $1.99+); No renewal markup (unlike Bluehost/Hostinger); 44 data centers (more than most competitors); VPS from $4.20 competitive with Vultr/DigitalOcean; European data sovereignty advantage; No managed WordPress unlike Cloudways/Kinsta; Support worse than SiteGround but prices much lower; Own infrastructure unlike resellers

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: Europe's largest cloud provider with no renewal price increases and own infrastructure
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: Developer or business wanting affordable, consistent pricing with European data centers

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: OVHcloud is excellent for developers and budget-conscious users who want consistent pricing without renewal markups, but support quality varies by region and is often criticized.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: OVHcloud is an independent French company founded by the Klaba family in 1999. It's publicly traded on Euronext Paris (IPO October 2021) with the Klaba family retaining majority ownership.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: OVHcloud web hosting starts at $1.04/month with no renewal increase. VPS starts at $4.20/month. Dedicated servers start around $55.99/month.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: No, OVHcloud is better suited for technical users. The interface can be complex, support is limited, and there's no website builder or managed WordPress included.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: Yes, the Starter plan includes 2 email accounts with 1GB storage each. Higher plans include 10 to 1,000 email accounts.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, WordPress auto-install is available, but there's no managed WordPress hosting or staging environment. More technical setup required compared to WordPress-focused hosts.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: OVHcloud guarantees 99.9% uptime for most services with SLA credits available. Scale dedicated servers offer 99.99% uptime SLA.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, but refunds are limited. EU customers have a 14-day withdrawal right for eligible services. VPS and dedicated servers are typically non-refundable once delivered.
